name: The Swiss Chalet
description: This 8 bedroom chalet (487 sqm) features a large master bedroom (55 sqm) and is located close to town, but more importantly, close to powder.

name: The Northwoods Cabin
description: This cozy 6 bedroom cabin has a large common area and a real woodsy vibe. Get ready to snuggle up with a hot cup of coco on cold winter's night!

name: Comfy Cottage
description: This modern 2 bedroom cottage has 2 large flat-screen cable TVs, high-speed WiFi, private ski storage, and a jacuzzi. Just what you need after skiing powder all day!

name: Deep Tracks
description: Located just 200 m from the slopes, this 1 bedroom apartment is ideal for those seeking fresh tracks.

name: Deep Tracks 2.0
description: Located just 200 m from the slopes, this 1 bedroom apartment is ideal for those seeking fresh tracks.

name: The Works at Deep Tracks
description: Located just 200 m from the slopes, this 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment has it all. Besides its great modern amenities and two full bedrooms, it has a loft which can sleep two additional people. Ski powder all day, and then live in luxury at night!
